meanings.definition: The quality or state of being cyclical.
meanings.sent1: The cyclicalities of nature are evident in the changing seasons.
meanings.sent2: Economists study the cyclicalities of the market to predict trends.
meanings.sent3: The cyclicalities of the washing machine made it seem like it was dancing.
meanings.sent4: Her life had its own set of cyclicalities, like a never-ending rollercoaster.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the beauty of cyclicalities in a mesmerizing painting.

meanings.definition: The occurrence of events in a repeated cycle.
meanings.sent1: The cyclicalities of the moon phases are fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent2: Historians analyze the cyclicalities of wars throughout history.
meanings.sent3: The cyclicalities of birthdays always bring joy and celebration.
meanings.sent4: In the city, the traffic lights create their own cyclicalities of stop and go.
meanings.sent5: The cyclicalities of the tides remind us of the constant ebb and flow of life.
